info.description: Developing a platform that helps users track their spending, set a budget and manage their financial goals
info.title: Budgeting SYSTEM API

get.description: Get an existing Account record by ID
Get an existing Budget record by ID
Generate a performance report for a specific budget. If the spent amount exceeds the budget amount, a notification will be created.

400.description: Failed to generate budget performance report

get.description: Get an existing Category record by ID
Get an existing Goal record by ID
Generate a progress report for a specific goal by ID

delete.description: Delete a transaction and revert the user's balance accordingly

get.description: Get an existing Transaction record by ID
Get the count of income transactions and the total amount received.
Get the count of spending transactions and the total amount spent.
